headline: Duke Energy seeks to renew operating license for Robinson Nuclear Plant for another 20 years
summary: Duke Energy announced today its submission of a subsequent license renewal application to the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) for Robinson Nuclear Plant, located near Hartsville, S.C. The application requests extending the plant's operations for an additional 20 years.

headline: Duke Energy Invests $600,000 in North Carolina’s Community Colleges To Build Next Generation Workforce
summary: A total of 19 community colleges will receive $500,000 in grant awards Additional $100,000 will support the Forward Fund to expand access to training opportunities for students Duke Energy’s ongoing commitment to workforce development totals ...
